page.title: 19Trade:Market Day in Retford
page.content: Being a busy housewife with two small children my food and clothing allowance is very tight.{Thursday and} {Saturday markets}are therefore ideal for{basic shopping}needs.Both markets are equipped with vegetables,fresh fish and flower stalls:babies,men's and women's clothing:shoes,linen and towels:birthday cards and gift paper.The odd luxury stalls sell jewellery,leather goods and cosmetics. Carpets,pottery,D.I.Y,wool fabrics,habadashery are also sold. In contrast{,Friday market}is more specialised,selling ;bric-a-brak,brass,second-hand books and clothing:a market designed mainly with the collector in mind. {Market day attracts buyers}from the outlying villages who enjoy a day's shopping.Small cafes and newsagents benefit from{casual trade.}
